title: Interpretation of someone telling you about death in a dream: Hearing the news of death in a dream

preview.html: Symbols that can predict the death of a specific person or the owner of the vision Symbol of the death of one of your relatives, whether known or unknown There are three known or common situations in dreams about this symbol: A familiar person tells you about death in a dream There are many dreams that involve dialogues and discussions between familiar people who live in your environment. These dialogues include indications or direct talk about the death of a specific person or are directed directly to the dreamer to tell him about death in a specific place or time, and in such cases this symbol has nothing to do with death other than it is classified in the speech of the soul and in the event that there are other symbols that have implications or interpretations of the dream according to these other symbols. An unknown person portends your death or the death of one of your relatives in a dream Seeing such an unknown person telling you about the death of one of your relatives or your imminent death, if you are a dreamer, either the speech or talk is direct or includes some sentences or words that express condolences or a hint of death in your environment. It is a necessary interpretation. Seeing the dead tells you about the death of a relative in a dream. The dead person in a dream has a special status and is often interested in interpreting dreams in which a dead person appears and takes what he says seriously because we believe and believe that the dead is in the house of truth and speaks only the truth. I have explained this issue on several occasions. . Regarding seeing such a familiar dead person telling you about the death of a relative, or this is mostly true, but the question is when the dream will come true. This cannot be determined. It can happen immediately after the dream upon waking up, and it can be delayed for months, both cases are possible. There are several cases and types of dreams that include symbols indicating death, and there are many of them, some of which are related to actions and movements, and some of which have nothing to do with the dreamer's health condition as well. As a context for the dream. Seeing someone telling you about your death in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing measles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing measles in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing measles in a dream means that you will get money, a prestigious job, and family stability, as well as for men, divorcees, and widows, and providing interpretations of major imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad bin Shirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters, ancient and modern. What is Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing measles in a dream? Seeing measles in a dream says a lot of good and I am receiving my salary. If a married man sees that he has measles in a dream, it indicates that he will obtain a prestigious job and financial stability. Seeing measles infection in a dream indicates that you are hearing news Bad, anxiety and sadness. Seeing measles treatment in a dream indicates overcoming adversities and obstacles and the collapse of problems and troubles. See also: Interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing measles in a dream for a single woman? Seeing measles in a dream for a single woman indicates the problems and fears that she is exposed to. If she sees a girl If an unmarried woman is infected with measles in a dream, it indicates a delay in achieving the goals that one seeks to achieve, and it may indicate a job that brings a lot of money. What is the interpretation of seeing measles in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman dreams that she has measles, it indicates the approaching date of childbirth. And ease of childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees that she has measles, it indicates the birth of a healthy female. See also: Interpretation of osteoporosis in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing measles in a dream for a married woman? Dreaming of measles in a dream for a married woman indicates the ability to nourish and bless money and children. If a woman sees In a married woman’s dream, her children are infected with measles, and it indicates good offspring, their righteousness, and their obedience. Seeing measles spreading over the body in a dream for a married woman shows a lot of envy and hatred. What is the interpretation of seeing measles in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing measles in a dream indicates hearing good news and abundance. Livelihood and obtaining a job opportunity with a rewarding salary. If a divorced woman sees that she has measles, it indicates the end of worry and anxiety and the improvement of their physical and moral condition. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about measles on the face? Seeing measles on the face in a dream for a married woman indicates good news. Very stable and marital happiness. Seeing pimples scattered on the body and hurting the viewer is an ugly sight or feeling pain. It indicates the presence of malice and envy or worries and sorrows. What is the interpretation of a dream about a contagious skin disease? A skin rash in the vision. It portends a lot of goodness, hearing good news, and a lot of sustenance. And a lot of money for the pioneer through a distinguished project that generates a lot of money or a profitable project. Seeing a man afflicted with measles in a dream indicates hearing good news, good luck, a prestigious job, or a successful business project. See also: Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream. We are pleased on the site that We see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of seeing measles in a dream” through the comments and the dream team will

title: Interpretation of seeing eggs hatching in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggs hatching in a dream or dreams. Eggs are the embryo from which the bird emerges, and eggs are a complete food that contains a high percentage of animal protein, calcium, and protection from osteoporosis for children. We will explain in detail in this article the interpretation of seeing eggs hatching in a dream for an unmarried young man and an unmarried girl. As well as a married and pregnant woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, and submitting them. Interpretations of visions and dreams by great interpreters in ancient and modern times, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing eggs hatching in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing eggs in a dream indicates women and maids. Seeing yourself eating egg shells in a dream indicates digging up graves and exposing the private parts of the dead. Seeing a lot of eggs in a bowl in a man’s dream indicates polygamy or a large number of women around him. A dream about colored eggs indicates the birth of a female. I see you eating raw eggs, which indicates forbidden money such as usury, bribery, theft, and embezzlement. You see a lot of eggs, it shows a lot of money. What is the interpretation of a dream? Hatching eggs for a single woman? Seeing eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will get married soon. Seeing eggs in a girl’s house indicates the enjoyment of beauty and good health. Seeing boiled eggs in a girl’s dream indicates achieving previously planned goals. Seeing eggs hatching and chicks coming out indicates To obtain money. What is the interpretation of a dream about an egg that hatches and an embryo emerges from it? Watching a chicken lying on the eggs until they hatch and the embryo emerges indicates that good offspring may indicate a large amount of money. Watching eggs hatch and chicks appear indicates an abundance of goodness and the satisfaction of desires. What is the interpretation Dreaming of eggs from which a chick hatches? Seeing chicks in a dream indicates a humiliated, oppressed woman. Seeing and hearing the voice of a chick expresses anxiety and apprehension. Look at the chicken, says a beautiful, foolish woman. Seeing a chicken with chicks indicates material losses, and many chickens indicate a large number of offspring. What What is the interpretation of a dream about hatching duck eggs? Seeing duck eggs in a merchant’s dream portends a lot of goodness and an increase in profit. Seeing duck eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of desires. Dreaming of duck eggs in a married woman’s dream means hearing good news. What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs falling? Seeing eggs Falling and breaking shows many problems and disagreements. Seeing broken eggs indicates material losses and loss of a job and can indicate anxiety and sadness. What is the interpretation of a dream about bird eggs hatching? Seeing gray bird eggs It indicates lies and rumors. Seeing bird eggs indicates good news. Seeing a white bird In a dream for an unmarried woman, it indicates that her marriage is approaching. What is the interpretation of a dream about hatching eggs for a married woman? If a married woman sees that she is buying eggs, this means that she will soon receive some money. Seeing boiled eggs indicates pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees that she is collecting a lot of eggs This indicates that she has saved money at home or in the bank. We are happy to see the reception of your dream about “interpretation of R.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single man by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single woman: It is one of the good visions for a young man who is about to get married, as there are many interpretations and indicators that convey the meaning of seeing a single woman’s wedding in a dream, according to a group of the most famous interpretation experts. The most prominent of which are Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi, and marriage is one of the necessary things that God has bestowed upon His servants in order to bring joy and pleasure into their lives, as God Almighty described it with tenderness and mercy, as stated in His Noble Book, so let us consider for you the most important interpretations related to the interpretation of the dream of marriage for a single woman in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of marriage From a single person: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a young man in a dream has many meanings mentioned by many interpreters, as some of them reported that it bodes well for the man. If the young man is single and marries a beautiful girl in a dream, this portends goodness, and if he is very happy with her in a dream, then this dream indicates Great good. Also, a single person’s marriage to a second wife in a dream indicates that he will join a job or get a new job, and the single person must pray to his Lord to grant him success in all good things and achieve happiness in his life. Because this vision with supplication will advance this person in his life and God will bless him from where he does not expect it. Some commentators also said that if an unmarried young man sees that he is going to get married and that the girl in the dream is beautiful, then this is a sign of good nutrition and abundance, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single man for a son Serene: The interpretation of a dream about marrying a single man in a dream indicates that his marriage is imminent and that he will actually get married. As for the interpretation of a single man’s vision of marrying a beautiful woman in a dream, the vision indicates that he will marry a fair virgin whose goodness matches the beauty that he saw in the dream. Interpretation of a single man’s dream is that he He decided to get involved with a girl and was thinking about it a lot. This vision indicates that he will succeed in this matter and marry this girl. However, if he saw the same vision in a dream, but it was an ugly woman, then this is evidence of his lack of success in this marriage or his disagreement with the engagement. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single man by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about a single man who gets married. In a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen, it indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will improve or that he will acquire a new profession. After all, the interpretation of seeing a wedding party in a dream for an unmarried young man without a bride, despite the presence of a feast and attendance, is an indication that his life is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single man From Nabulsi, Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a single man marrying an unknown woman in a dream indicates the bad circumstances of his life and his death. Seeing a single man in a dream kissed by a beautiful virgin girl means moving to live in another new and wonderful place, or a promotion in his job, or that he will get a new job, It is also an indication that he will obtain a lot of money. The interpretation of a single man seeing a girl in a dream and then she dies. This vision indicates that he will go through a difficult period and will become very tired during it. But if you see in a dream a mother marrying her unmarried son, this indicates the sale of the property that he Owned by the online dream interpretation website, it is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world

title: Interpretation of seeing cloves in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cloves in a dream: Seeing cloves for a man indicates profit and halal profit from his field of work, while cloves mean his wife or wife. After that, cloves in general, denote a woman who is distinguished by purity, dignity, and honour. But if a young man sees a clove in his dream, this It indicates his association with a beautiful girl and a good personality. Interpretation of seeing cloves in a dream by Ibn Sirini: Dreaming of cloves in a dream means that you act wisely and logically, especially when making fateful decisions regarding life matters. And if you see that I am eating cloves, it indicates the dreamer’s disagreements and problems that will remain with him for a while. In addition to that Dreaming of a new clove plant means that you are giving advice to other people. I saw in my dream that I was distributing cloves to people, and they were all in one place, and this is evidence of the dreamer’s generosity, giving, and generosity. I saw white cloves indicating good health and well-being that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing cloves indicates new emotional relationships that the dreamer will enter into. I dreamed of a large field of cloves, and this is evidence of the lawful person’s profit and the various amounts of money he earns and relieves him from his job. Interpretation of seeing collecting cloves in a dream: I saw in a dream that I was picking cloves, as this indicates an enjoyable and happy moment with a lover or partner. Buying cloves in a dream indicates a love relationship on the one hand with a lot of effort on the other hand. I am watching a clove field, it indicates living in luxury and enjoying life after a while. I dreamed that I was planting cloves, this indicates immediate change and doing what your lover asks. Interpretation of a dream Taking cloves in a dream: Seeing and eating cloves indicates disagreements and quarrels in the life of the dreamer. I see taking a clove, it indicates the fulfillment of dreams and goals that the dreamer seeks, as well as the behavior of reason and wisdom in matters of life. But if the dreamer sees that he has eaten cloves in a dream, this indicates his great mind. Which makes people turn to him for his opinion and advice. Eating cloves in a dream is a sign of helping people with advice and guidance. Interpretation of clove oil in a dream: Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is distributing cloves, is evidence of her acting with perfection and wisdom, and of her generosity and giving. I saw you in a dream of white cloves, this is a sign of... The dreamer's health. But if he sees a large field of cloves in his dream, this indicates that he will get a lot of money and improve his financial situation. Seeing an unmarried young man in a field of cloves in his dream means a great job from which he will obtain and earn halal money. Cloves in a dream indicate An unmarried girl indicates that you hear news that satisfies the heart, then eating it in a dream is evidence of family problems. Eating cloves in a dream indicates exposure and illness. I saw what I drew with clove oil, which indicates abundance and abundance of food, then recovery from illness and disease, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a clove flower In a dream, seeing a carnation flower indicates the presence of many problems and difficulties in the life of the fortuneteller. Cloves have an attractive appearance in a dream, as it indicates the search for a suitable person in the relationship and a person.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing cloves in a dream: Seeing cloves for a man indicates profit and halal profit from his field of work, while cloves mean his wife or wife. After that, cloves in general, denote a woman who is distinguished by purity, dignity, and honour. But if a young man sees a clove in his dream, this It indicates his association with a beautiful girl and a good personality. Interpretation of seeing cloves in a dream by Ibn Sirini: Dreaming of cloves in a dream means that you act wisely and logically, especially when making fateful decisions regarding life matters. And if you see that I am eating cloves, it indicates the dreamer’s disagreements and problems that will remain with him for a while. In addition to that Dreaming of a new clove plant means that you are giving advice to other people. I saw in my dream that I was distributing cloves to people, and they were all in one place, and this is evidence of the dreamer’s generosity, giving, and generosity. I saw white cloves indicating good health and well-being that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing cloves indicates new emotional relationships that the dreamer will enter into. I dreamed of a large field of cloves, and this is evidence of the lawful person’s profit and the various amounts of money he earns and relieves him from his job. Interpretation of seeing collecting cloves in a dream: I saw in a dream that I was picking cloves, as this indicates an enjoyable and happy moment with a lover or partner. Buying cloves in a dream indicates a love relationship on the one hand with a lot of effort on the other hand. I am watching a clove field, it indicates living in luxury and enjoying life after a while. I dreamed that I was planting cloves, this indicates immediate change and doing what your lover asks. Interpretation of a dream Taking cloves in a dream: Seeing and eating cloves indicates disagreements and quarrels in the life of the dreamer. I see taking a clove, it indicates the fulfillment of dreams and goals that the dreamer seeks, as well as the behavior of reason and wisdom in matters of life. But if the dreamer sees that he has eaten cloves in a dream, this indicates his great mind. Which makes people turn to him for his opinion and advice. Eating cloves in a dream is a sign of helping people with advice and guidance. title: Interpretation of a dream about a gecko Seeing a gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a gecko in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, if a small gecko is killed at home in bed, then the albino and the gecko of Imam Al-Sadiq and the gecko - Al-Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of the gecko in a dreamA gecko in a dream is isolated, commands evil and forbids good, and is gossip that spoils People. And whoever sees that the gecko has eaten from his flesh, he is behind him, and appears to the enemy with a loud voice, and he is a climbing person who likes to appear with your personal effort. If you kill him, you have exposed him and exited your connection with him. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, mentioned the lizard, and he said: By the order of Umm Shariq. God please her. It is that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered her to kill lizards, saying: (He used to blow on Abraham, peace be upon him). The stomach in a dream can indicate escape, quick escape, and escape. Gagging in a dream may indicate the jinn or Satan. Because it is light and fast-moving, it can only be seen with difficulty, and it requires effort to kill it, and some of its types are poisonous. It is one of the symbols that may indicate magic and its demons. Because the fire of Abraham, peace be upon him, was struck, and lepers are not all bad. Seeing geckos sometimes indicates that there is someone who secretly loves you. Geckos in a dream may indicate that you are ignoring people in the surroundings. It can symbolize an enemy with bad qualities. It can be fears and thoughts, but if you get rid of them in a dream, it is better. There may be a warning of bad people. The gecko is an evil woman who walks with gossip and finishes. About virtue, and its most important qualities are evil and hatred. A gecko in a dream indicates that it accompanies the most miserable people and represents evil, and it is said that it is bad for whoever sees it climbing the wall of his house or climbing on his bed. A gecko is bad in homes, rooms, and kitchens, and it is good to dream of killing it or taking it out From the place where he entered. The dream of a gecko for a married woman. It symbolizes an intractable problem in her home that may be related to money or livelihood. It expresses the passing differences between the spouses. If a married woman sees that he is killing her or killing her, she will be freed from worry, fatigue, and anxiety. She was told that her debts have been paid or her needs met. Interpretation A gecko for a single girl indicates hypocrisy and flattery. If an unmarried woman sees it in a dream, this indicates the presence of someone who harasses or annoys her from time to time, as it is difficult for a girl to get rid of him easily, and it is often a man. A gecko in one dream can symbolize a jealous or envious girl. Or the chattering of a gecko symbolizes a pregnant woman in a woman’s fears and concerns about the mother during childbirth or pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is killing a gecko or running over it with a shoe, then she will go through the difficult stages of pregnancy and the birth will be easy, God willing. Passage: Killing a large gecko in a dream to remove worries, sorrows, or major problems such as debts and illness. And imprisonment, regarding killing a little gecko, shows that small problems such as quarrels or disputes within the family will calm down. It is not good in a dream to see a man as if he was cooking the gecko or eating its meat, because in the interpretation it symbolizes failure, failure, illness, or falling into a trap or snares set by a malicious woman or

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car with someone you love for individuals

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about riding in a car with someone you love for single people is one of the interpretations that many people search for and for which you may not find many interpretations that indicate the appearance of some things and events in the dreamer’s person. Upon investigation, it became clear that the interpretations differ depending on the viewer, whether he is single, married, divorced, or male. Each of them has an explanation other than the reason for the viewer’s different interpretations. You are exposed to some life pressures. Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car with someone you love for individuals. Through a different website, single people will know the interpretation of a dream about driving a car with someone you love: This vision shows an unmarried woman that she will be freed from crises due to delayed marriage. She will move to a new house, which is a house Married, and living happily by God’s will. This indicates that the parents are satisfied with the person who wants this girl, loves her, and will propose to her soon, and is one of the people suitable for her. There are some opinions of some interpreters that indicate that this dream indicates that the dreamer has a strong desire to marry. From this person because she has feelings for this person, so she saw him in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman driving a car with a person. Many commentators have come up with multiple interpretations, because they carry multiple connotations depending on the situation that the viewer is actually going through. These interpretations are as follows: If the car the girl is driving is black, this indicates that she may face some problems in her life, but these problems will end soon by God’s command. If she sees that she is riding with someone she knows and is late in marriage, this indicates that she will receive Happy news soon. If the car she was riding in was green, this indicates the abundance of livelihood that this girl will earn. If he wants to get a job, he will get a new job that will bring him a lot of goodness. It also indicates that this girl has many goals that she wants Achieve it and you will reach it by God’s command. There is another opinion of some interpreters that if an unmarried girl sees that she is riding a horse with someone, this means that the dreamer will go through a dilemma in life and she wants someone to stand by her side until she faces this crisis. But if she knows, this indicates that she will marry a pious young man and live with him in peace and security. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with a stranger in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees in a dream that she is driving a car, but with someone she does not know or does not know, this may have some interpretations. Namely: This vision shows that this girl will change a lot in her life in a clear and tangible way. The interpretation depends on whether the person she is riding with is beautiful, as it is evidence that these events will be happy. But if she sees that the person she is riding with is ugly, this is evidence that there are some... Problems in a girl's life and she will face misfortunes, and these problems may be due to her lack of self-reliance. . But she wants a lot of people to interfere in her affairs which will harm her. If the person has a fat body, it means that these events will be good. If she has someone whom she has lost for a long time, she will come back.

title: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding my niece in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding my niece in a dream If you, dear reader, are looking for interpretations from scholars who express the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding my niece in a dream, we present them in the following lines..Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding my niece in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about breastfeeding my niece in a dream . Breastfeeding a child can indicate burdens and responsibilities, and God knows the unseen. When you see an unmarried girl breastfeeding a child, this may be a sign of anxiety, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees her breastfeeding her child, then she expresses anxiety, and God knows best. If a divorced woman is seen breastfeeding a child, this may represent Her responsibility, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a brother being unfair to his sister in a dream. Seeing another person's injustice can express bad things, and God knows the unseen. Whereas wrongdoing expresses the collapse of the home and its troubles, and God knows the unseen. While injustice may indicate God's forgiveness, God also has knowledge. If the dreamer sees injustice from his relatives, this may indicate tension in His relationship with the family, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my lost nephew in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my lost nephew in a dream We did not find clear meanings for seeing this. However, seeing a lost child in a dream can be a sign of loss, and God knows the unseen. When you see the loss of a son, it can turn To pressure, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees the loss of a child, this may indicate a loss of hope, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my niece crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream when I see my niece crying in a dream may reflect the difficult psychological state of the aunt, and God knows best. The unseen, as it can express the psychological problems that the dreamer is going through, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her niece crying, this may be a sign of the disintegration of the family, and God Almighty knows. If a married man sees his niece crying, this may indicate failure at work. Or study, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my little niece in a dream could indicate longevity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the death of her niece, this may indicate the stability of the life she lives, and God knows best, while seeing the death of her niece It may express problems and troubles, and God knows the unseen. It may also express the sister being exposed to troubles, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that my niece got married in a dream. I dreamed that my niece got married in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for watching my sister’s wedding. However, seeing my niece in a dream could be evidence of love. And attachment to her, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself breastfeeding her sister’s daughter in a dream, this may be an indication of goodness and living, and God knows the unseen. It may also indicate seeing her sister’s daughter marrying her cousin’s son. It may represent the paternal aunt’s pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about the color red in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the color red in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man wearing red and a red dress, Ibn Sirin’s red shoes for Imam Al-Sadiq, and more. Interpretation of the color red in a dream. It is a symbol of great emotion and a sign of sensitivity in emotional relationships. Anger, revenge, and hatred sometimes appear in the dream if the color red dominates. In a dream, it indicates confusion or problems. It symbolizes the great passion between lovers, if it appears in the dream in the form of red roses. As for blood, if it appears in the dream, it spoils it and loses its meaning. If the dreamer sees the walls of his house red, many problems will arise and major quarrels will arise between individuals. HomeAnd if he receives a red gift from someone who is not in a good relationship with him, then there will be reconciliation between them. This color in the dream does not reflect calm and stability at all, because it shows anger and tension. If the color red appears in your dream, this is an invitation to revive feelings and awaken feelings, and it may seem that the red color warns you against falling In a mistake or slip. The red rose in a dream expresses a new emotional life characterized by high and noble meanings and expresses the highest levels of love. As for the red sky in the dream, it expresses the danger lurking on the horizon and it is also a symbol of unstable and acute whims and moods resulting from psychological trauma or... Severe depression. As for the beautiful red flame in the dream that does not cause fear, it is a symbol of the vitality and positive energy that the dreamer enjoys. When a person sees in a dream that a flame or fire is burning around him, this means security and enormous psychological power that will devour all his worries and burn him to useless ash. The color red in a dream often symbolizes heat and warmth of feelings and is a symbol of pure or immortal love and color. Red in a vision expresses effective spiritual activity or constructive intelligence, and the color red is also a symbol of revolutions or anger, and it is the most prominent color in visions and its positive manifestations for women. Sometimes it is annoying for men. Interpretation of the color red in a man’s dream. The color red in a man’s dream varies in interpretation according to the thing he saw in In his dream, the red color in a man’s clothes indicates danger or entering into an adventure with unknown consequences. A red car in a man's dream symbolizes the world of passions, whims and unstable moods with bad results, and sometimes it symbolizes a woman. The red coat in a man’s dream symbolizes the security that comes from a woman. Interpretation of the color red in an unmarried girl’s dream: The red color in a woman’s dream is very praiseworthy, and as we indicated from the beginning of the article, it symbolizes a strong or emotional passion. Most women's items are red in color, such as bags, shoes, hats, and dresses, so we find them appearing strongly in one dream to express positive energy, strong feelings, or a new beginning in life. A long or beautiful red dress in an unmarried girl's dream expresses effective psychological energy that can be transformed into success. or
